summary: Completed comprehensive testing of combat sports judging tool. Backend API fully functional (6/6 tests passed). Critical Firebase module loading issue identified - Firebase SDK not loading in browser despite proper installation. This blocks bout creation and entire E2E workflow.

critical_bugs.issue: Firebase SDK modules not loading in browser context
critical_bugs.error_message: Module not found: Error: Can't resolve 'firebase/firestore' and 'firebase/app'
critical_bugs.impact: Blocks entire application workflow - bout creation, event logging, real-time scoring
critical_bugs.technical_details: Firebase modules installed correctly (v12.4.0) but webpack cannot resolve firebase/app and firebase/firestore imports. Build logs show module resolution errors despite proper package installation.
critical_bugs.root_cause: Webpack module resolution issue with Firebase v12.4.0 imports

integration_issues.issue: Cannot test operator panel, judge panel, or real-time features due to Firebase module loading failure
integration_issues.technical_details: All Firebase-dependent functionality blocked: bout creation, event logging, score calculation integration, real-time updates

passed_tests: Backend score calculation with complex algorithm (200 OK)
Backend edge case handling - empty events (200 OK)
Backend edge case handling - invalid events (200 OK)
Frontend bout setup page loads correctly
Frontend UI styling and responsive design
Frontend component structure and data-testid attributes present
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix Firebase module loading issue. The problem is webpack cannot resolve 'firebase/app' and 'firebase/firestore' imports despite proper installation. This is likely a build configuration or Firebase version compatibility issue. Consider: 1) Downgrading Firebase to v9.x, 2) Checking webpack/craco configuration, 3) Using different import syntax, or 4) Rebuilding from scratch with proper Firebase setup.

success_percentage.backend: 100% (6/6 tests passed - all API endpoints working perfectly)
success_percentage.frontend: 20% (UI loads but core Firebase functionality completely broken)
